Beerskis Seven Springs February 1 - 4 2007

The fifteenth and last Seven Springs Ski Trip.
E-mail from Tim
Hey Ya'all, Once again, a fine trip it was. Thanks to all for coming along for the ride. It was a bit rough getting it together this year, but in the end, I'm sure I'll only remember how fun the trip was. By the looks of the pics I took, my guess is you all had a good time as well (some too good :-). As I've said before, it's not where you go or what you do, but who you're with that makes good times great. I couldn't ask for better people to party with. Cheers to you. As usual, there'll be many Beerski stories from this trip added to stack of stories from previous trips; some good, some bad, but all will be funny in time. Tricia/Bernie - I'm very glad you're still with us after doing donuts on I-270. Way too close a call. I hope everybody else made it home safely. Special thanks to Edie - if not for her truck and patience (far more than my own), we wouldn't have got everyone up and back. Next year? Who knows? That's a lifetime and hopefully many excellent adventures away. I've gone through and edited all 100 or so pictures I took. Nobody on this trip is planning to run for office, right? In between way too many photos of Chad (I'm like his personal photographer I guess), I have pictures of PDA, lots of dancing, Rockers w/ bad hair, threesomes on cots, ass shots, and some real good group shots. Attached are some of the group shots, the others I may send out only to those in the shots. Yes, that is censorship, but if someone had a picture of me sucking face with someone, I don't think I'd like it if they sent it out to the whole group. Contrary to what some may believe, I try not to be a "jackass" all the time. Thanks to all, hope to see you soon, Tim
